description:
Versatile and lightweight, the Beta offers mobility and comfort for all-mountain activities. This paired back version of the classic "AR" has been trimmed down shave valuable grams, with the addition of the C-Knit™ backer that's more breathable and comfortable against the skin. The softer material is also quieter, making less of the "swishing" sound common to many waterproof jackets.

  • 3-layer GORE-TEX waterproof-breathable membrane with a durable nylon face fabric
  • GORE-TEX C-Knit™ lining slides easily over other layers and reduces weight while adding breathability
  • Articulated construction promotes dynamic moves in mountain environments
  • Low-profile hood is adjustable with a single adjuster
  • Micro seam allowance of 1.6mm reduces bulk and weight
  • High volume hand pockets with WaterTight™ zippers
  • Internal chest pocket with laminated zip
  • Laminated, die-cut Velcro® cuff adjusters reduce bulk, and won't catch or tear off
  • Drop hem provides extensive coverage, with cordlock adjusters
  • Trim fit accommodates layers
name: Arc'teryx Beta Jacket - Men's
